context: This project is a web application to manage events and transactions among friends.

It is built with React (19.1.0), React DOM (19.1.0), React Router DOM (7.6.3), Zustand (5.0.6), i18next (25.3.2), react-i18next (15.6.0), MUI (7.2.0), Emotion (11.14.0), TailwindCSS (4.1.11), Vite (7.0.0), and TypeScript (5.8.3).
The code should be clean, reusable, and follow the camelCase convention.
Functions and components must be documented in English.
The design should be responsive and accessible.
User experience and code maintainability are prioritized.
Use React hooks and functional components.
Avoid duplicated logic and prefer component composition.
When providing code examples or suggestions, use the versions of the main dependencies as specified above.
